Interface ec.e.util.IndirectElement 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Interface ec.e.util.IndirectElement

public interface IndirectElement
extends Object
This interface allows an object that is an element of an Enumeration to provide an object of its choice in place of itself when the Enumeration is iterated over. Arguably this should have been part of the standard Java class library all along.

getElement()
Provide the object that this object wishes to have represent it in an Enumeration.

getElement 
  public abstract Object getElement()
Provide the object that this object wishes to have represent it in an Enumeration.
